name: Shelby
description: Shelby Token is a proof-of-stake blockchain platform for reference utility crypto-currency used for the world of arcade games and entertainment fans. The goal of the Shelby Token is to be a reference utility crypto-currency used for the world of arcade games and entertainment fans. The objective is to create value using the smart contracts for all investors in this decentralized economy which is exponentially growing. Our ambition is to set-up our new crypto-currency available on as many smart contract powered platform worldwide, starting obviously with gambling.
